full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNAM SHES GONG DU 'PHO BA'I RGYA CHER BSHAD PA GSER GYI SGO 'BYED PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @029A *, ,CES RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO KHA SBYOR GYI BRTAG PA BRGYAD PA'I RAB BYED GSUM PA, RNAM SHES GONG DU 'PHO BA'I RGYA CHER BSHAD PA, GSER GYI SGO 'BYED PA ZHES BYA BA, RGYUD GDAN BZHI DANG, ZHAL GYI LUNG RNAMS LEGS PAR GUS BSGRIGS SHING, DE DAG GI 'GREL PA RNAMS LA 'DRIS PAR BYAS NAS, NANG DU THOS PA'I DGE SLONG SHAR TZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS 'BROG RI CHE DGA' LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS BLO GROS SO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS PAR @029B BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SVASTI, RGYAL BSTAN BAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR DGA' LDAN THEG CHEN GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL, ,MANGGA LAm, ,
